text: «Naa ɠa é ba, ee, gá-ƓALAGI, ɗɛi è wɔɔlɔai, è yeeɠaaɓaai, è maayikiai, ɗɛi è ɗa-minazeɠegi makɛsu, ta ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai, soma è mina gá-maanɔɠɔi ɠa ga faa yɔɠɔfɛlɛ, nii é zeizu gi ma, gá gá-masagiti, ta gá-ɠundiɠiiti, gá-zalaɠa ɠula nuiti, ta gá-ƓALA goo wo nuiti, gi-mɛmɛwolani, ta ɗa-nuɓusɛiti gi pɛ ma, é tɔɔzei Asiili masagiti ta-ziɛgi zu ma, é zeeli za ma.
